description: Get out there with the Mountaineer Max Cushion Tall Crew Socks. Featuring their most advanced Indestructawool technology for enhanced durability, their 4 Degree elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit, and a Virtually Seamless toe for enhanced comfort. Go far and feel good in our thickest and warmest performance sock.
name: Smartwool Mountaineer Maximum Cushion Tall Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 77% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon, 12% Recycled Nylon, 1% Elastane
